summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 5th Avenue and 5th Avenue South, from Madison Street to Dearborn Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving the unpaved portions thereof, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7676 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
